Arghh I just wrote a long product review and my phone erased it! Long story short-the fit on this coat is extremely flattering and it is a beautiful coat. The problem for me is that it was too small, which is my fault because I should've taken measurements before ordering. I am normally about a size 8/9 and the medium fit like a 5/6. I could not get it to button and I have long arms so this did not work for me; I recommend taking careful measurements before ordering and if you are going by US sizes, order "up" not down. (If you are a size 7, order a large!!) shipping will take some time because it is shipping from China, so order now, before it gets cold! (Again, measure measure measure!! To avoid returning which cost $33! But the company was nice enough to credit me the $33 return shipping cost!) long story short, this coat is just as nice as the expensive coats I saw in the department stores (I actually ordered 3 different coats on Amazon, hoping that one would fit-one was too large, one fit and one was too small) all three were from China. This one was the too small one (again measure first!)

P.S. I just finally took measurements for myself and it turns out I needed an XL - so... Again. Measure.

Absolutely the most ridiculous dress I have ever bought.  Stupidly I did not read the reviews before purchasing, had I, I would not have bought this.  First off there is NO ZIPPER, I could barely get the dress on over my shoulders because the waist is so fitted.  Then there is a loose flap that is supposed to cover your back and rearend behind the lace-up back, but there is nothing to hold it in place so you better hope it doesn't slide or you will be showing everyone your goods.  Once the dress was on, and finally tightened up enough and tied, it looked really nice (minus the huge bow because the strings are so long).  But then it was just as hard to get back off.  If I were you I would save your money, unless you have someone who can alter it to put in a zipper and hooks for the flap.

The armholes are WAY too small. I bought a size 4, and when the straps were too short/the arm holes too small, I bought a size 6. But the bigger size has the same problem! Every time I raise my arms (even if it's just a little bit!), the dress cuts into my armpits and restricts my arms' range of motion. The rest of the dress is great......I just wish it had adjustable straps or bigger armholes.

reviewText:
I ordered 80/36B in black
I'm 5'2"  135 lbs  waist 29"  hips 36"  bra 36B  size M
Super cute & very sexy. Not too see through. Comfy to wear all day. Good fit. Gives good support for having no padding. The bottom of the band in the front where it comes down under the breasts folds up when wearing but doesn't affect fit, just how it looks, not a big deal. Arrived a little before delivery estimate.  Overall very happy with this purchase.

This lace bra is wonderful. I'm fairly certain I will buy another! It is comfortable, fits well, and looks just as cute as in the product photos. I was able to order my standard american size in the bra and it fit great.  This style of bra is not very supportive, there is no underwire, and it is not at all lined, just lace.

I like it so much, I would give it five stars, but the underwear that came with the bra are far too small. I was aware of the size difference people experience sometimes when ordering directly from Asian companies. And while the bra fits perfectly, the underwear are what I would consider an "extra small" in American sizes. Unwearable for me!

However, the bra itself is perfect, and at this price, I can buy other underwear to complete the set.
summary: This lace bra is wonderful. I'm fairly certain I will buy another

UPDATE:  Adjusted this review to 2 stars.  After about 4 months of occasional wear, one of the grommets pulled out and the canvas tore.  A month later, the grommet below it pulled out and now there is a large hole in the shoe.  See photo.  I'm hoping the last the 7 weeks until the end of school.  My son does still love wearing them, however.

PREVIOUS 4 STAR REVIEW:
I was happy to find some decent looking uniform shoes for my son.  These shoes are attractive and fit the bill being just gray and white lace ups.  When I first put these on my Kindergartner, my husband kept commenting on what cool shoes they were.  He thinks they look just like Vans.  My son liked wearing them and said they were comfortable.
The soles are a little stiff.  We usually buy shoes with super flexible soles for our kids, but these are stiffer, like a Converse.  However, my son never complained about it.  The shoes and laces have held up really well so far and seem to be well made.  They fit true to size and we had no problem getting them on even though my son's foot tends to be a little wider than average.

I received a discount on these shoes in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Grommets tore out after a few months.

These are great so far, they stay in my ears even when sleeping, they don't hurt, I just stretched my ears with silicone so my ears were howling.
(Side note, don't under any circumstances stretch with silicone, horrible way to do it, but I was in a hurry to do it.)
So I snagged these and put them in, after about two days my ears were basically healed and feeling better.
My one issue is that these are definitely for "after-stretch retaining" so you can get them in easy, however that means you get a smaller flare, I like bigger flares, but I'll manage :P

Ps. (To those seeing the "too small" comments)
3/4ths gauge is 19.05mm (round that out, it's 19.00mm), these are the correct size, whatever they bought prior to these were prolly a size bigger. Pay attention to sizes, people!

Pss.
I apologize for my weird ears (had upper lobes done, ripped, big mess, they are now gone and I have a slit lol), but the silver one is day one, and the black ones are day 3. Significant difference in healing speed than I'm used to.

Of course, I had to try them on at that point and run to a mirror. They are stunning! But after a few minutes of wear, I realized that these are a little heavy for me and I had to take them off. LOVE the jewelry, handcrafted so well, beautiful design, but on the heavier side. My tolerance for much weight is low, so don't let that deter from these if you love the design. reviewText: Beautiful dress

I am incredibly pleased with this dress.
When I ordered I almost immediately received an email asking for my measurements to ensure that I had ordered the correct size. When I asked them about color (I was unsure of whether it would be white or ivory) they asked me to specify which I would prefer.
There was a little bit of trouble with the delivery coming on time, but I believe this was the fault of DHL express, and not this seller.  I was able to pick my dress up from the post office about three days after the expected delivery date, so it wasn't horrible.
The dress is stunning. I was off course very wary of buying a dress online from China, but I did so due to the good reviews, and because I trust Amazon to intercede with a bad seller. I was therefore somewhat expecting this to be a bad purchase, and was VERY pleasantly surprised by the quality.
I have yet to find any sewing errors, tears, etc. I was also pleasantly surpassed to find the sleeves with a thin lining of the mesh material to protect the skin from the scratchy applique. I had tried on several dresses in nice boutiques that didn't have that and were really scratchy/itchy and uncomfortable. So that is a nice feature.

I ordered a size 12, I'm 5'9" and about 160lbs. I have an average build, pretty well proportioned, although a bit more on the pear shaped side but with broad shoulders. The dress fits me, but only just barely at the shoulders, bust, and arms. There is a little wiggle room in the waist though, and it is plenty long enough.
I would recommend a petticoat unless you are very slender, and even then would probably be helpful.
I am wearing a petticoat in my pictures.

So far I am incredibly happy with this dress and my purchase... I cannot believe the deal I got here!!! I would definitely recommend.

The dress is nice. There are two layers of tulle beneath the layer of lace, and a layer of satin or satin like material beneath it all. There is no need for a hoop skirt with this dress. My wedding is in April, so I will be looking for a reception dress given how hot it is when wearing the dress.
summary: The dress is nice. There are two layers of tulle beneath the ...

I received these baby girl toddlers headbands at no cost for my review. These headbands are brightly colored and very pretty. The bands are slightly smaller than I would prefer but they work fine. The center of the flower has a jewel that might come off which concerns me just a bit. Our girl will wear these but we will be very careful that the jewel is secure. I believe it might be a better product without the jewel. I did examine each headband and at this point the jewels are secure. The flowers are very pretty and the bands look really nice on our girl.

I was a little concerned that these would have a chemical smell to them, since that happens with stuff from China at times. However, they don't at all. The colors are vibrant, the flowers are soft and pretty. The little pearl accent in the middle is attractive and not gaudy. I like them a lot and they have colors to go with practically every outfit your baby might have. I don't like pink and don't really buy pink items, so I gave the peach, light pink, and dark pink ones to my sister-in-law who also just had a girl.

The only thing is that they are a little large for a newborn, so they slide off. They are definitely okay for babies a bit older and toddlers. And actually, I can fit them on my own (small) head, although they are tight. However, I think they would comfortably fit a 5 or 6 year old with no issues.

Anyway, they make a great accessory for pictures. I like that they are soft and don't have any hard edges. Just make sure they don't make it into the baby's mouth.

I received these as a sample for review, either free or at a discount.

The set is really nice.  The colors are vibrant, not washed off.  The bands stretch enough to fit a toddler's head without being too tight.  The headbands I received were a little bit flattened so I had to fluff up the flowers.  I was concerned the thin fabric would fray but so far, everything is kept in place.  They are quite simple but cute, two flowers connected by a pearl/bead in the middle.  You get 10 headbands for a little over 10dlls at this point, not a bad deal.

It's quite small for a XXL, I should have gotten a 3 or 4 XL. I can't close it, it's way shinier than the pic (looks like pleather), the green is lighter...more like an olive green, shoulders aren't as squared as in the pic and the material is very thin. My suggestions for ordering from China (or Asia period) is to order way above your normal size, shipping is usually very costly so order something you don't mind keeping if you are not happy or you'll end up spending three times what you paid and ten times what it's worth just to return, AND most importantly, the item's pic is probably from a reputable site, but, coming from China, the item is most likely a cheap knock off. So not worth 30 bucks. I deal with it, but, you can probably find something much better in Marshall's or Ross's.

We used these on our trip to Europe. They are large enough to hold paper copies of our passports and also had little internal pockets for our credit cards and ID cards. There are two larger pockets for currency. They were comfortable to wear all day while walking around and being a tourist. One nice thing is that you can feel it under your shirt, and not wonder if your wallet still there. I can't vouch for the RFID security.

reviewText:
This dress is light, flowy and as is as pictured. True to size, and white is surprisingly not opaque, though it is sheer. I wish it looked a bit more pointed at the back - like the photos shows - it's definitely been 'shaped' to look like the way it does in the photo. The entire back side of the dress is the lower back edge of the dress so it is more scoop-shaped.  I felt it went a bit low in the back. I would prefer the dress to be a little shorter overall to look elegant from the back

I bought in white, only because the black in my size was not Prime, and seemed to be coming from china (~2 week delivery time).  I wish black had been available though.  I am usually wear about a size 4 (my specific measurements are 34B-28-26, 5'6" & 125 lb) and size 4 in this dress seemed accurate. It fit well - though keep in mind that it is a loose fitting & flowy dress.

Quality was decent. The fabric is a thick chiffon, unlined.  White was not see-thru, though it is sheer. I wouldn't advise dark underclothing and lace textures would show through. Stitching is smooth and straight.  I note that the pictures of the dress on Amazon could really be better quality - the black is photoshopped from the white and is a horrid representation. I hope my photos of the dress help prospective buyers.  Lastly - I received this product at a discount for my honest & unbiased feedback.
summary: As pictured, decent quality dress. Back draps a bit too low for me though

reviewText: Still awesome
I ordered this coat for my wife's birthday. I based the size on the information at your website. This coat and it up being too big and we had to send it back . We have not re-ordered as of yet.

I received my coat today, and I'm very happy with my purchase. After my last disappointing coat purchase, I wanted something very specific when I ordered this coat. The last coat I bought was not sized correctly, well according to American sizes, and the sleeves were very tight and the coat didn't button or zip, only had toggles, so it wasn't very wind/cold resistant. In light of that buyer's regret, this coat immediately made up for it!

The coat came in a large plastic bag, and was bagged separately inside the outer bag. Spreading out the coat, you immediately notice the thickness of the tweed on the outside. It feels very much like a wool coat would on the outside, but a bit softer to the touch. The coat is a very relaxed fit, with wider sleeves that taper a little to the thick, ribbed cuffs. They are very soft and can be easily folded back for easier movement and more warmth around the wrist. The front of the coat is fastened with both metal snaps and an inner zipper, with two tabs so the zipper can be opened from both ends without coming apart. There are two zippered pockets on the outside that can fit a cellphone, small to medium wallet, and keys, but not a large wristlet wallet.

Up at the top, you have a high, ribbed, fabric collar that can be zipped to cover the mouth and throat. This is surrounded by the tweed collar that can be snapped in place over the fabric collar for more warmth. I was very happy to see that the hood (with a small drawstring) can be snapped off the rest of the coat and be separately washed. The coat comes down past the rear and lands just about my knees, and even with the zipper and snaps, is very comfortable to wear and sit in. One thing I noticed with some longer coats is that if the size is even slightly off, it is very uncomfortable to wear while driving or riding in a vehicle if you have the zipper/buttons/snaps all the way fastened. This coat, thankfully, doesn't have that problem at all.

***Here's a piece of buyer's advice: The size chart they show on the Amazon page is ACCURATE! When they say that a 1X = 22/24W, they are correct. Do look at the size chart provided to see what size you need to order, and if you are a little unsure, maybe go one size up, but absolutely no more than that!

I was intentionally looking for a larger sized coat that would be very comfortable and easy to wear while layering underneath it, and that's exactly what I got by ordering the 1X. I can easily wear a sweater or sweatshirt, layers of thinner shirts or tanks, jeans or dress pants underneath this coat and I'm guaranteed to be comfortable in this relaxed, slouchy winter coat.
summary: Size Chart Is Accurate And I'm Very Satisfied

reviewText:
1. I received it within a week! So impressed! (Thailand)
2. The corset is very heavy and stiff so it gives you a great straight posture when you walk or sit at the working desk. Which is very good for me cause I always hump my back when working on the computer. This corset helps me a lot.
3. The design is so beautiful so I'm sure your boyfriends will love it.
4. Very difficult to wear. First 2 days it took me 1 hour to button it so I have to find the how to wear video to learn. But once I can wear it, it is quite comfortable. Not as torturing as I expected.
5. Anyway cause I ordered a small size 24" to shrink my now 30" waist to my original waist 24", it can't fit me. I have to loosen up the string to max in order to wear it.

This is 2nd day I wear it. I will update my result within 2 weeks.

UPDATE (after 1 week)
1. I wear it 6-7 hrs. daily. (I tighten up the string to make the corset as tight as I can)
2. I eat carb, sugar, coca-cola as usual. No diet/No exercise.
Cause I want to make sure the corset works on its own without any additional weight loss regime.

RESULT : my waist shrinks from 30" to 28.5 in 7 days.

I'll update again after 14 days.
summary: The corset is very heavy and stiff so it gives you a great straight posture when you walk or sit at the ...

For $20 I'm impressed and will most likely order the same suit in a different style/color!

I am pleasantly surprised that I liked this tankini so much.  I ordered the XL in the Blue Leaves design.  For reference, I am 57, 150.  The suit is just a tad big on me but I had followed some other reviews about it being smaller.  I think a large would have worked just fine for me, however, the XL is not so big that I have to send it back.  Its great!

I love the design that I chose and I love that there were so many options!  I would have picked a few different ones but settled on the Blue Leaves design.  Im glad I did.

I wouldnt say that the top or bottoms have a good support system so if you're looking for that, then these probably aren't for you.  The bottoms didn't have a bikini-type lining in it, just the thin lining in the shorts, which made the shorts stick to my skin and outline EVERYTHING when I was in the pool.  Something to keep in mind.  The top seems more of a cover than anything and doesnt really support the girls.

I thought about getting a M/L, but I decided to go with a larger size because the fabric may stretch too thin and become see-through, and also the seams may split if they are too tight around my hips.  These leggings look like regular denim, and I could wear them for work if I want to.  I have not washed them yet.  I'll wash them inside out in a net for protection. However, I hate wearing tights or leggings under my pants since they add bulk and it's uncomfortable to have an extra waistband. These are the perfect solution! They cover enough of my leg to feel warmer and protect my skin and they would also look cute if worn with a skirt! The bottom half of my leg is about 20 inches from floor to top of the knee. The widest part of my calf is 14 inches and the circumference around the area right above my knee is 16 inches. These socks cover my knee with about an inch or so left over. The band is pretty tight so they don't roll down too much. They kinda slid down to my knee a little when I crossed my legs as I was sitting but it wasn't too big of a deal. The fleece inside is black and super soft. Overall, the socks are very stretchy yet fairly opaque. I love this purse. It is roomy, with the huge inner pocket separated by a thin cloth divider, which helps with organization. Inside, it has a med sized zipper pouch on one side, 2 little pen/ lipstick/ earbud pouches on the other, and a key hook to keep you from digging around to find them. There is a roomy zipper pocket on the exterior of the purse, which is where I keep my phone for easy access, and the details on the outside are beautiful.
The strap is long, adjustable by buckle, and can easily be worn cross body. It smells fantastic, and the leather is thick, zippers are chunky but close smoothly. This is my new go to bag, it's a cavernous carry all and matches anything I wear.

If you are interested in purchasing this ring, Id highly recommend it! UNLESS if you have small fingers!! I am size 4.5 but decided to go a size up since half sizes were not available. It was quite roomy, but my main issue is that the outer stones will rub against my pinky and middle finger constantly, which I found to be very irritating. Otherwise, the stones remained in place and kept their shine up until now, and my finger never turned green. Ive attached photos with and without flash, and these were taken yesterday.
summary: beautiful ring BUT BEWARE IF YOU HAVE SMALL FINGERS!!

reviewText:
Wow, these Swarovski CZs sparkle like crazy. I was amazed. It looks just like those diamonds in display cases under the bright lights. Swarovski makes beautiful, perfectly cut CZs. The ring is well made. The band is sturdy and has good weight. The stones are securely set, with beautiful filigree in the setting under the stones. This band is size five and it fits true to size. The platinum plating makes the ring shiny, bright, and far more expensive looking.

It is eye-catching and no one can tell it's not made of diamonds. The stones are not huge, so it's not something people would suspect is fake. I would never pay those inordinate prices for a piece of jewelry that can be lost or damaged. This was cheap and looks just as nice.

The inside of the band is stamped with "925" and "CHINA."
Just the right ring for every day use, beautiful shine.
For the money, this is a great ring. It's not an overwhelming size for a small finger. It sparkles very nicely.
This ring is fantastic with the best quality!!!

reviewText:

My husband has had issues with his feet since he was a kid. He has numerous pair of shoes and work boots he wears and has been trying different insoles to see what feels and works best. The DoctorInsole brand has been working very well for him. The arch support in these is really good and feels good on his foot. These are a harder insole but have a memory foam cushion layer on them too for comfort.

I ordered a size 12 for his size 12 shoes and they fit in them perfectly. I didn't need to trim them at all. He really likes the layer of memory foam on these and says it takes a lot of pressure off his feet while he's on them all day at work. Normally we always bought just the cheap foam ones at the store which had to be cut down to fit the shoe or boot so it was nice that these didn't need that. Also the ones that are just foam from the store, doesn't last him and slide around in his shoes. These DoctorInsole ones have stayed in place and I anticipate them lasting him a long time because they truly are a real nice quality. I/we would definitely recommend these insoles to others. My husband loves them and so do his feet!
**I received this product with a promotional discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. No compensation for a positive review was provided. All of my reviews are based 100% off of my experience with the product and I never guarantee a positive review.

BOTTOM LINE:
At about $130, this dress is good bargain, but it will likely require that you pay a seamstress to add a lining to the top.  Measure yourself and pay attention to the size chart before making your order.

CONS:
-- The top is see-through.  I will need to have a nude lining sewn through the top. Buyers of other dresses made by Now and Forever had commented that the dress top was see-through, so I half expected this.
-- The bra cups sewn into the see-through lining are bright white, not nude, and are clearly visible like a pair of headlights.  HELLO!
-- Pay close attention to the measuring chart and measure yourself accordingly.  Your size will likely be larger than your typical US size.
--  I must hem the skirt because I am a petite and I ordered a regular.  I suggest that petites either order a custom size or alternatively be prepared to have the dress hemmed.
--  To wear with a regular bra, I will need to have someone pin the top to the back of my bra.  Another woman might require a low back bra, depending on her shape and size and bosom.

PROS:
-- The seller Now and Forever contacted me by email after making the purchase through Amazon.  The representative was easy to understand and to deal with.
-- The skirt of the dress has train and is meant to trail.  A tall woman would look very elegant the regular size I think.
-- It fits beautifully through the bust and waist (if you pay attention to the measurements and follow the instructions!  Bra size is not "bust" size).
-- The bead-work is good.  It is not too heavy. The beads did not look cheap or tacky.
-- The skirt's fabric is very pretty and nice to the touch.
-- The see-through fabric onto which the top's beading is sewn is not itchy.
-- The look of this dress is very elegant. With alterations, it would be suitable for black tie functions. I will be wearing it as a "reception dress" at my wedding.
summary: Good value for the money, will need alternations to remedy see-through top, measure yourself carefully to ensure good fit

reviewText: This  is so cute.  It is beautifully made covering most of the marvel characters.  A nice femine touch while flying your nerd flag.

I am always looking for accessories to show my love for all things Marvel. All of the scarves I have looked at before are wintery scarves meant to keep you warm.  This is good for any season.

The Amazon product image is very accurate. The scarf is brightly colored, with clear images of the Kawaii versions of Hulk, Iron Man, Captain America, Spider-man & Thor.  I was disappointed that, once again, no Black Widow even though this is a product designed for women.  What's not apparent in the pic is that the scarf has a sheerness to it - slightly see-through.  It's very long, so it's versatile for tying in different ways or wearing over your head like an infinity scarf.  Please see my pics.

Overall, I love it and wish there were more like it with the comic and film versions of these and more characters.

reviewText: Unless you have the flatted ass in the world, don't wear these.

They are very soft like other reviews say and the construction looks to be pretty good....I am an American size medium with ample assets in the front and back so I was a little skeptical of the sizing.  I was shocked they fit well and I will have to wash them to shrink them just a tad around the cheeks.  There is great room in the front and a good amount in back.

After wearing these( I washed them beforehand), they seem to be riding a little bit in the butt. The elastic around the legs and package area is not as strong as I would like it to be, leading to spillage, wedgies and twisting. For me,  these should be for wearing at only leisure moments. These will not be your work horse underwear, like ones you can wear to work, gym, Etc. or for extended periods.
summary: Check the sizing and you should be good.

reviewText:
This set of two kitchen implements -- a timer and an instant-read thermometer -- provide some basic functions, although the thermometer is not accurate enough to use for candy-making or anything that requires an exact temperature reading.  Both require one AAA battery each, and the batteries are not included.

Although the timer is somewhat clunky-looking, it works well and is easy to read with huge (1 1/8" and 7/8") numbers.  My real issue is with the thermometer.  In boiling water, not touching anything but the water, it measures between 216-218 (it fluctuates) when it should read 212.  There's also no safe way to attach the plastic thermometer to a pan.  It's probably accurate enough for situations where a few degrees wouldn't make a difference.

I can't recommend this set based on the temperature inaccuracy of the thermometer.  I tossed the thermometer but kept the timer.  Note:  I received a free sample for review.

-- Debbie Lee Wesselmann

This sweater is amazingly soft and fits great. It is a little thicker which is perfect for winter, and the fabric has some give to it. It could easily be dressed up or down and I'm very happy with it!

I bought the navy color. It looks just like the picture. When I received it, it had some wrinkles that I had to iron it. I usually wear size 4P or 4. This sweater fits me fine. The shoulders are a little wider than my real shoulders but because it's not loose, it doesn't add obvious width to my shoulders.

It's very warm to wear. Once I put it on, I haven't felt "cold" the whole day. The material is soft and very stretchable so that even if there is no extra room in arms and elbows, it moves with me that I don't feel unbearable tightness. It's very comfortable to wear. I like the length that covers my bottom. The lower part of the sweater is very forgiving being flared out with ample room underneath. I would just wear short-sleeve or sleeveless top inside as if I wear long sleeves, it would be not easy to pull up the sweater from the elbows to upper arms due to tightness. I would be careful in pulling it. Since the material is very stretchable, if you pull hard, you could see your own fingers through the material that if not careful, it's possible to pull out a hole with long sharp nails.

The collar can be worn rolled up or down. When it's cold, I can roll it up that has the effect of a scarf to keep me warm. When it's not that cold, I can wear it down that is very versatile.

This sweater although is very warm, it pilled after I wore it for two months. There are many small balls under my elbows.

It's perfect for my casual wear at work that looks sophisticated with its flattering shape, instead of just a regular rectangular shaped sweater without waist line. It's a more refined everyday sweater.

I have seen a few posted photos here with the fabric around the boob cups (don't know how else to phrase it) flipped up. Ladies, do yourselves a favor, flip that fabric down and position the ladies right in the darker, criss-crossed, rouched fabric only. Make sure you fold the surrounding bit of fabric down. Now look down and admire your own cleavage,

Seriously though, it's stretchy, flattering, comfortable, and spins well when twirling. This would be a fun dress to wear for dancing. Like actual dancing, with actual moves - not clubbing.

The one thing I don't like is the fold of fabric i mentioned above continues to the back of the dress and ends in two corners at the back zipper. These corners tend to flip up, which annoys me. I plan on tacking them down, which is at least an easy fix.

This is my watch. I love the beauty in simplicity.  Currently having over a dozen wrist watches collected over many years, I continued to search for my absolute soulmate time piece.  When I first viewed this watch online I couldn't believe it.  I looked at it every day for weeks.  It's not inexpensive and it was tough to pull the trigger. If I had seen the watch in person, I wouldn't have waited.  The quality is superb.  The minute hand moves slowly.  The hour indicator "jumps".

If you're one to cherish seconds, or date, or the time in Hong Kong this watch is not for you.  But if you love simplicity and a certain amount of novelty in having one hand only, then this might be the watch for you.

Now owning the watch for several weeks, I can say I'm even happier than the first day received.  I've worn it to bed and only remove to shower.

Needless to say, I'm very proud of the MeisterSinger.
summary: I love the beauty in simplicity

Certainly not cheap, it's worth every penny.

reviewText:
I am junt in love for this watch. He looks so classin and modern at the same time. It is so cool how all the little dials in the inside move. You can see through the watch and stare at the little gadgets move around.  I bought this watch for my boyfriend and he loves it. I thought it feels heavy on the wrist (at least the front part of the watch) but my boyfriend actually liked and said it feels confortable, so maybe it was my impression. If there was a simmilar in a smaller size I would wear it. It is stainless steel and it looks more expensive that it actually is.
The only thing that I didn't like was the packagte. The watch came in a plastic case and there were some fibers/dust on the inside (see photo). At first impression I thought the watch was dirty, but is just little fibers stuck on the protector plastic. After you take the plastic out it looks shiny!
My favorite part is that it doesnt need batteries so you don't need to worry about anything! Just wear it and go!

I just boutht two (one for my boyfriend and one for my brother in law) as gifts and I`m very satisfied. Would definitely come back and buy another (specially wen it`s on sale!!).

Disclaimer: I received a discount on this product in exchange for an honest, unbiased review. This review is a reflection of my own personal experience with this product and has not been influenced in any way. Hope this can help you. If it did help you somehow, please press the "YES" button at the botton, it really helps. Thanks.

The Harwish Men's Sport Center Circle Hollow Waterproof Stainless Steel Wristwatch in Silver is a good value for your money!

This watch has a great aesthetic to it! It has a super classy look and looks manly on the wrist.

Fit: As usual with the metal clasp bands sometimes the adjustment to get a good fit can be tricky. This band actually had the nest placement for fit for my own husbands wrist! I was so glad that he is able to wear it without it moving around on his wrist or too tight and causing skin irritation.

The face and dial are gorgeous! Great attention to detail and my husband loves the Skeleton workings showing. I really like that there were two tones so you can really see the difference between the watch face and the inner workings.

This was very easy to set and keeps the time perfectly. I didn't run into any issues with the battery or setting it at all.

My husband has gotten quite a few compliments on this watch, some from co workers that wear very expensive watches!

This came packaged in very basic packaging, but I have some extra watch boxes and was able to place it in one of those before giving it to my husband!

Overall: Stylish watch with a great price!!

Wow!  This watch is absolutely beautiful!  It is beautiful yet still very masculine. This watch seems to be built pretty tough.  I love how it looks on my wrist and I get a ton of compliments while wearing it.  The band itself is more lightweight than the watch face though.  I would have expected the band to be a little thicker for this watch but it looks great and you can't really tell.  It does make the watch weigh a little less.  Overall I'm VERY impressed with it and would recommend it to others.  It seems like it would cost a lot more than what it's listed for.  Great purchase!  I'm looking forward to seeing more Harwish products!
I purchased this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This watch is beautiful. The design is amazing, a mixture of antique and modern. Suitable for everyday wear, yet elegant enough for formal. It has the appearance of and weight of a very expensive item minus the crazy price tag. Once you or your loved one takes a look into the face of this watch, you'll be head over heels. I gave this item as a gift, and I believe I've started an addiction. The watch arrives in s small rectangular plastic box. Mine also had two rubberbands wrapped around it. I suppose to make sure it didn't open during shipping. That I found to be quite tacky. The packaging in no way competes with the craftsmanship of this piece. It also comes with instructions. Also fairly tacky, on a cut off strip of paper. So if gifting I'd definitely upgrade the packaging. The recipient of this gift, loved being able to see the inner workings ,the weight and feel. And the old fashioned winding of the watch. It has a stainless steel backing and linked band with a secure closure. With enough room to fit most mens wrists. Great gift or purchase for anytime of the year. And a superb addition to any collection. I recieved this product at a discounted price for evaluation purposes.
the mintues hand did not work. Returned it immediately.

summary: It looks nice and feels solid

reviewText:
I love Skeleton style watches. And to get a Skeleton that is also an Automatic and has luminous hands !!?? When you combine the three, the average price is normally $250 and up so this watch is a steal !

This is a large watch - the face is 42mm (similar in size to Invicta, Diesel, Tag Heuer). And it's wide also, nearly 1/2 inch thick. Watch does not come in a box, so if you plan to gift this, you'll need to go buy some stuff for presentation.

Face and bezel have a lot of details.
Bezel:
-- The color of the lettering and numbering is consistent. Font used is the same for both letters and numbers, Spacing between characters is good
-- The 2 Pushers (located at 2 o'clock and 4 o'clock) are for looks only, they have no function
-- The Crown (located at 3 o'clock) is used for setting the time (pull the Crown out) and for winding (when the Crown is in - roll / turn clockwise to wind). Based on what I see on the back of the case, via the glass window, it appears that this watch does incorporate a kinetic arm, which will wind the watch for you based on your arm movements. If you don't plan on wearing this watch everyday, I recommend you wind via the Crown.

Dial:
-- Hour, Minute, and Second hands are luminous (they glow at night)
-- Second hand ticks but it the movement is so subtle that it almost looks smooth, nearly Rolex smooth, almost as good as what Bulova uses for their Precisionist series
-- The Hour Markers also appear luminous
-- There's hash marks and numbers indicating the minutes / seconds (3 sets between each multiple of 5)
-- Sub-dial in the center also has tick marks for each multiple of 5
-- There's 4 arms spelling out (in very small font): Harwish (at 2 o'clock), Automatic (at 4 o'clock), Watch (at 8 o'clock), and Sport (at 10 o'clock)
-- Raised platforms along the Dial Ring, which span every multiple of 5

The back features a clear window (I can't speak to the type of material, but it should be some type of crystal). The back can be removed - it's threaded versus snap.

The band is fairly lightweight and not the best quality. It features the standard 2-step clasp, to open: pull up on the locking bracket, then push the two spring loaded buttons on the side. The links can be removed but these don't use pins. Instead they use "stretch band links," which are flat pieces of metal connecting two links together. These can be a pain in the butt to remove. Normally there's arrows indicating the direction of removal; however, this band doesn't have them. I plan to replace the band with something more heavy duty, which uses pins instead of the stretch band links (I prefer to do my own adjustments).

Overall, I am impressed with the amount of detail and care put into this watch. I'm blown away that for what the watch is selling for, that it's an Automatic. Very, very happy with this even though I'm going to replace the band.

I hope you found this review useful.

I was able to purchase this item at a substantial discount in exchange for a thorough and honest review. All observations and comments are my own. Please don't hesitate to leave your comments or to ask me questions.
summary: Skeleton, Automatic & Glow in the Dark hands? This Watch is a Steal !

reviewText:
I like the simplicity of this bag!  Sometimes I want something with a little more detail, but this is a great every day bag.  Something strong and sturdy to put my laptop and other devices in.  I also like the simple look makes it unisex.  I have a few bags my hubby out right refuses to carry, he himself has grabbed this one a few times when he need to take the laptop.
So there is two big pockets the back one is great for your laptop.  It had a little slot and also a Velcro attachment to keep your laptop in place.  There is padding in the front and back here to prevent your device from banging around.  In front of that is some extra room to store your chargers, mouse, ect
The front pocket is super organized and has a place for everything!  Pens, notepads, business cards and other small things.  Both pockets zipper so you don't nee to worry about anything falling out.
The front flap part has a really small area I found this to be perfect for my cell phone.  That way I can easily access it without having to dig around the whole bag.
The should strap is adjustable and has a pad up top to protect your shoulder from the weight.  Also their is a strap on the back, I've been using this around my waste in crowded areas.  That way I don't worry about my bag hitting someone or about someone trying to grab it off of me.
I was sent a product to provide my honest feedback
summary: Nice size and very simple!  Great from him and her

reviewText:
This is a fantastic bag!  Thoughtfully designed, sturdy, well made and YES - genuine leather.  It will hold a few books and a tablet, has a couple of pockets for smaller items (pens, coin purse, etc) plus an outer pocket that's perfect for cell phone and keys.  It can be worn as a messenger style bag, or over the shoulder (you can shorten or lengthen the shoulder strap).  I was absolutely delighted with the purse from the moment it arrived and plan to use and enjoy it for years to come.

Oh, and one more thing: although a bit snug, you CAN fit an 11 inch MacBook Air in, and get the zipper shut on top.  The bag wasn't designed to hold a laptop, in that it doesn't have padding, but in a pinch it will hold your MacBook Air (11 inch) and keep it secure.

This is my first S-ZONE bag and surely won't be my last.  Great job!!
summary: I've found the purse/bag of my dreams!

reviewText: Beautiful colors!! Doesn't look cheap at all.

The scarf is beautiful and the pashmina and silk combination is very soft. One side is mostly white with black designs while the other side is the opposite being mostly black with white designs. I chose this color combination because it can go with nearly any outfit. The quality is excellent. I was surprised that with so much fabric there were no snags in the material at all. There were a few loose threads hanging from the fringe, but nothing that compromises the design or quality. My scarf measures 31 inches wide and 75 inches long (not counting the fringe), which is a few inches wider and longer than the listing states.

There are so many different ways to wear this scarf. The listing shows it used as a shawl in 3 different ways, as well as one scarf position. I research online and found multiple other ways to tie it to get different scarf affects. I even saw people using similar scarfs as shirts and skirts. I wish the company would include instructions on how to do some of the different ties or make a product specific video and include a link with the purchase though. I do sometimes find it hard to wrap/tie the scarf where the tags aren't showing. It will just take some practice I guess. Overall this is a great quality scarf that is beautiful and very fashionable.

I tried contacting the seller twice--to no avail--to let them know that I received a flawed product.  This tunic tee was dyed improperly leaving two white lines intersecting each other across the chest area.  As for the dye color itself, instead of it being a true red, like I was hoping for, it is somewhat of a muted shade with a bit of an orangey tone to it.  But thankfully, I still like it. The top also wrinkles really easily. Other than that, I really liked this tunic tee.  It has a flowy feel to it and handkerchief heamline drapes nicely over the hips.  Heads up, it does run a size small.  I normally wear a size XXL, so I ordered an XL, and it fits perfectly!  I got at least a couple of compliments on it, saying that it was cute and that it looked nice on me.  Like all the other shirts from this line, the materials utilized to make it are very soft.  The fabric is somewhat stretchy and sort of clingy, so make sure you wear smooth and lightly colored undergarments, otherwise they will show through.  It looks good on its own and also layered with a cardigan.  I really like the thickness of this shirt because it was thin enough to keep me cool, but thick enough to keep me warm and comfortable.

Disclaimer: I was compensated for a portion of the purchase price in exchange for my honest opinions about this product.  I am in no way associated with this company or with Amazon.

reviewText:
This particular tee is 1 of my favorites as I'm a tried and true camper.  The washed out purple is great.  The quality is consistent with the standards of LIG tees.  The shirt is 100% cotton made in Peru.  They wash and wear well, and I expect to get years out if it (barring any stains or campfire ember mishaps).  It's super comfy, both the fit and the texture of the cotton fabric.  I use the dryer and shrinkage has not been a problem.

I'm not an unbiased reviewer.  At last count my Life is Good collection has gotten past the 2 dozen mark, and they are more or less a uniform for me.  Over the years the LIG crusher shirts have gotten more form fitting.  That can be a good or a bad thing depending on preference.  The crusher tees are certainly not as form fitting at the LIG Newbury tees, but they're not as boxy as the crusher tees of old (we're talking 4 years ago old).  Over time they wash and wear REALLY well!  And get almost a patina quality.  Or perhaps I just tell myself that because I don't want to move on my tired old tees.  Also, the logo has changed on the hip tag (not as pictured as of the writing of this review), it's gone from "Do what you like, like what you do" to "Do what you love, love what you do."  If the substitution of "love" for "like" on the hip tag ruffles your tail feathers you're probably not the typical LIG customer, however I thought I'd mention it, because well sometimes change can be hard <- joke ;-)
summary: The washed out purple is great. The quality is consistent with the standards of ...

reviewText: As soon as my son tried this on, the top button broke in half! I will be returning and not ordering from this site again. I needed this jacket for an upcoming event so now I have to go out and find a different one! Disappointed!

I will tell you the way to make sure you get the exact size you need with zero chance of mistakes.

Find a jacket, coat or hoodie in your closet and look at the tag. For get the letter of size, use the numbers under the letter like 42-44 or what ever you wear and use that to pick the size here. To me, this fit exactly like me jacket.

This is a great looking sport's jacket that really looks as good as a suit.  The color is a very dark blue that has to be I'm bright light to not look black. This very well made and doesn't seem like it should tear easily if nicked on something. The lining inside looks very good and is a lighter material, almost of the same color.

I like the two buttons aren't the cheap buttons a lot of dress clothes use to minimize them from being noticed. This are nice thick buttons that really add style to a awesome looking jacket.

This isn't really something to keep you from being cold, but it will work on slightly cold days. With a long sleeves dress shirt underneath cold weather would be more than tolerable.

I like the pickers this has a lot.  The pockets are all big and you have them inside and outside the jacket. The inside one could be used to carry a pistol easily and still keep others clueless that you have it.

The  is a perfect price and you are getting a great jacket here. It looks very good and will last quite awhile.

* Notice: Sometimes I get offered a small discount for my writing skills. I am not a paid reviewer like amazon's review team for amazon's items. reviewText: So I originally thought this was a rain jacket when I ordered it....trust me, it's not. After getting caught in a quick rain shower on a hiking trail, I was soaked to the bone in less than 5 minutes. That being said, it is listed as a windbreaker so it's my fault for not paying attention.  This super-light jacket is cute and unique when compared to the bland polyester coats in stores, but it is extremely thin so really it's more of a fashion statement piece than a functional layer of protection. But the price is so low, so I'm okay with all of that. I do think it runs a tad big, so if you're a female looking for a cute little windbreaker definitely order a size down from what you would assume. Overall, this was a decent purchase for a pretty low price, just not as much protection from the wind and rain as I was hoping for.

I was pleasantly surprised not just with how beautiful and soft this sweater is, but how comfortable and well-fitting, particularly for my long arms. I'm 5'6" about 128 lbs. with legs up to HERE, so a bit short-waisted. I got a medium. The hem hit at what I'd consider a perfect length, mid-hip. (In fact, it fit me almost exactly as it does on the pictures of the model with the dark hair.) The neckline is slightly wider than your average round neck, thus the "boat neck" in the title/description, so that had the effect of broadening my somewhat narrow shoulders a little and I LOVE that. When I was furnished this sweater at no cost with the invitation to leave an honest and completely unbiased review of it, I was pleased with the opportunity.
summary: I'm never disappointed with this brand - it's like they were made for me!

I was excited to get this for a trip to NYC, and I had contacted customer service after seeing it was coming from China - they were very nice and kept me in the loop. I felt assured it would arrive in time, and it did. Unfortunately, it arrived terribly wrinkled and I could never get it to smooth out enough to wear it. I threw it in the dryer, after spritzing it with a bit of water even, and the wrinkles STILL would not come out. I'd hoped the wrinkles would fall out over time but it is still like that - not as bad as it was, but still wrinkled... Very disappointing in that regard. I would think they would consider that in shipping. I didn't have time to contact the seller or ship it back, so I just let it go. I guess since it was shipped all scrunched up from China, and it is still wrinkled, it is likely permanent. It does fit a little weird too, the arms are really long and though the jacket does fit over all, its a little tight over clothes, so not all that comfortable - I would only wear it for the good looks... and, it has no pockets, so not very practical either. Not sure if I like the zipper thing at the bottom either. I know some reviewers love that option, but if you're like me and you don't like short stuff-and you know you'd never unzip it, it's just a little strange... looks good in the picture, but on, it is... well, just "different." So, if you're looking for an inexpensive, cute jacket that does look like leather but is not at all practical but is very "unique" - and you don't mind a few wrinkles than be sure to order at least one size larger.

reviewText: I love these belts.  Will never order the regular kind again!

Found a ratchet click belt at a local Ross store and thought it looked "gimmicky", but figured it was worth a shot. The real reason is that I have several belts, but my favorite fits just a fraction better than the others and it is ragged out and the others are still new and stiff. I had been searching for that size 40 belt that fit like a 40.5 I guess. Long story short, it worked great. I read a review about a guy sweating one out and it fell apart, but the one I have still looks new after two or three months. I decided to get one in brown to go with the black one and just snagged one on Amazon because it looked like the same exact kind. Beware! I got a Comfort Click belt and was dismayed that it was not as wide and the buckle design was completely different. And not nearly as good for me. The other belt got the good sounding name, but the Ratchet Click belt got the design right. The great things about it. 1 you don't have to bend the belt and search for a belt hole so it is quick and easy and doesn't crease your belt. 2 The strain is on the track system and not on the hole and the belt so you don't get a wallowed out hole or a buckle crease on the belt. 3 and the best thing is that it has one quarter inch increments so it fits like my favorite belt before lunch and after lunch and after working out too. The release system is SO easy and convenient (not like the Comfort Click which uses the buckle itself and the release) and you can tighten or loosen silently and quickly with no fuss. I love just grabbing the buckle with one hand and the tongue of the belt with the other and gently tugging it till it clicks to the perfect fit. My only caveats are that they don't offer a gold or brass buckle and I would really like the belt to be about an eighth or quarter inch wider. This belt delivers on the promise that I always thought might be there for those "web belts" that just wrap around the buckle. But those are just too flimsy and tend to loosen up because of the friction catch not being secure enough. I don't regret buying this belt and will be buying a dark brown next to go with this tan one.
What I like about is that it looks like a normal belt, the ratchet mechanism is easier to use  and its width is slightly smaller that many of the other ratchet belts.
Need a notch in between standard spacing? This is the solution! Nice looking leather belt. Brown for jeans. Black for dress. Buy both & never buy any other style belt.

The outside slip pocket holds my iPhone 7. The one zipper compartment holds 4 plastic cards in separate slots (the ones I use most often), bills, coins in the zipper pocket, and various other cards such as membership & coupon cards all together (not in slots), plus has a key ring, where I keep an extra house key.  The other zipper compartment holds 8 cards in slots on one side & on the other side in the checkbook holder it holds 5 cards in slots & a pen. In the part where the checkbook goes I have various other cards & papers.  I could carry my checkbook in my wallet there would be room, although it would make it thicker, I do not carry my checkbook with me.  The cross body strap is a good size to carry just the wallet as I do often.  Like the other reviewer said "it holds everything".

reviewText: It is actually nicer than the picture. Great style and quality.

Love this watch. It's a hunk of Steel

My third Invicta purchase.  I have a few watches in my collection.  When I was nine years old I traded all my G.I. Joes for a $10.00 casio watch because it had a compass on it, my dad was NOT happy!  Been in love with watches for a LONG time!  In my collection I have a Submariner an Omega Seamaster, some Citizen Eco drives (Nighthawk and Navihawk are my favs in that collection), Diesel watches, Kenneth Cole,  down to $65.00 Casio watches that had something neat or different about them so I bought them.  My more expensive watches were purchased pre-kids and 529's! LOL! I mention that to stress that cost and bang for my buck are more important today then ever.  I travel all over the country and I have seen a few friends as I travel with Invictas and really liked the look of the ones I have seen.  This being my third one I can say these are really cool watches.  I have had this one a day and have had two different people ask me what I had on?  Not saying that is why I like this watch but it can't "hide" on your wrist as this is a large watch and heavy!  Love the look, feel, fit and finish of this watch.  I was a little concerned with the weight of the watch not being comfortable on the wrist but this bracelet is really built well.  I think the weight of the watch was in mind when they made the bracelet because it feels great.  I am a larger person, 6'3" and 255lbs.  With that said I have pretty small wrists, they measure 7.5".  I have included some pics of the watch both on and off my wrist.  The bezel looks really cool, it is distressed just enough to give it a different look but still very up scale looking (IMO).  What I really liked about this watch was the interesting and different crown and pushers.  They look really neat and function pretty cool as well.  So far, the Invicta watches I have purchased have been amazing for the money!!!  I had to take 5 links out of the bracelet for a good fit.  due to the weight of the watch it needs to be a "little" tighter than some of my other watches. I used a vice and a few tack cloth or towels to wrap around the bracelet to tap the pins.  Easier for me that way.  It was very easy to do. If you want a large and industrial looking watch this is it!  Super happy with my purchase, I would recommend this watch and the brand to anyone.  Even the box Invicta put this watch in blows my Rolex and Omega away?  Really cool presentation!  Have a large trade show in Vegas coming up and am interested in seeing how many people ask me about this watch.
This has to be one of the nicest Invicta next to my Bolt  it's definitely a eye catcher and the price was right my collection is growing every month
summary: Almost looks better than the Bolt

reviewText:

Sizing: Sizing from China is DEFINITELY inconsistent with American sizing, so do your research before purchasing. I am 5'10", 160 lbs. I got the 4x size and it fits well for a casual fit. It isn't too tight or baggy at all. I could have definitely got the 3x for a more "fashion" fit and still fit just fine.

I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for a thorough and honest review.

This is a very nice shirt. The color is right, and the fabric is even, but is not like those shiny dressy shirt. There is a texture with the fabric, making it a good match for either formal dress pants or a business casual type of pants like khaki or even nice jeans. The seams are smooth and tight, showing good quality. When I first received it, I was panic after seeing the size on the tag being 3XL, and then realized it is from China, that probably is the size they use in China. The size I ordered is M, and looks like it is just about right. It is a little tighter than other shirts, but it is expected from the title of the product (Slim Fit). It arrived a lot quicker than expected. When I ordered, the estimated delivery was in about a month, but it arrived weeks earlier than the estimated date, Over all it is a nice shirt of good quality. I am happy with the order. I was offered a discount for an honest review.

When ordering i recommend that you make sure you check the size chart due to the sizes are different then you may be used to in united states. it runs small so order a larger size. He usually does not wear anything that is on the pinkish/rose color but he actually loved this color and wore it to the office in which some of the others commented on how much they liked the shirt on him. reviewText:
A great, well-fitting shirt. This shirt has very modern specs, leaving any modern-fashioned guy looking great. There were a lot of loose threads when I received the product, but that could just be from excess threads during the production - they were not from the shirt itself.

The thread used with this shirt is durable and of an above-average quality. The sleeve length is perfectly proportional to the chest size and the collar doesn't appear to ruffle at all.

It's a great shirt and makes for a great gift!!
summary: Quality thread and a modern fit. Highly recommend!!

reviewText: It took about a month to receive (didn't realize it came from China otherwise I wouldn't have purchased it). and it looks nothing like the picture

This shirt arrived, first of all, 2 weeks earlier than expected, so I am unbelievably happy with the speed of this company's shipments.  The shirt was bought for my husband and when he tried it on, it fit just as expected; definitely follow the size chart, because it's exactly right.  He's a medium, 15 1/2 size neck and a 34/35 sleeve, and he prefers slim fit shirts (as opposed to the traditional fit.)  This shirt fit similarly to a slim style, so something to keep in mind; if you prefer traditional fit, either go a size up or maybe look for a different shirt.  The neck/collar was perfect, although the sleeves were a tiny bit short; they fell just above his wrist bone, so about half and inch shorter than he'd prefer.  However, this is the perfect shirt for him to get away with rolling the sleeves, so that won't shortness matter; the shirt is professional, but is also casual.  It can certainly be dressed up with a tie, or it can be worn with jeans and a t-shirt; it's a good staple shirt to have, in my opinion.  In terms of craftsmanship, there were a few straggling threads on one side of the shirt, but I just clipped them; no big deal.  The shirt is very well made, and the fabric is soft.  I plan to order the green color for my husband, also.
My husband did refuse to pose for photos, so I'll update my review with a couple photos once I have the shirt ironed and hanging up.
I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: so I am unbelievably happy with the speed of this company's shipments

reviewText:
I was sent this piece free of charge, and invited to share my honest thoughts if I so desired.  I love the flapper style dresses, so was excited to give this one a try!  I chose the gold color.  It's a really lovely medium gold that I think will probably be flattering on most all skin tones - even works well on my pasty white skin.  :)  The dress is entirely lined and non itchy (although still slightly sheer if you look at it closely) - I think it will work completely fine without a slip, which is good since the top is low cut and it has thin spaghetti straps!  I love the tiny little sequins on this piece - they only measure a scant 1/8" in diameter, so smaller than most sequins.  The tassels are long (4" and no big issues with tangling and knotting yet (that can always be the problem with tassels.)  They are sewn on nicely/swing a bit when you walk.  Very fun!

I have this dress in the size small, so I would say the brand runs true to size.  I am 5'4", 110 lbs, a B cup and have a 27" waist.  I normally wear size 2-4 in US sizing.  This dress is made from a stretchy material so you have some leeway with the size, although the sewn on layers of fringe that run diagonal to the hem do NOT have stretch to them.  The top spaghetti straps are adjustable so the piece more easily works for a larger range of chest and shoulder sizes.  Conclusion?  At the under $30 price point, this is a great costume dress and I think you'll really enjoy it.
summary: Fantastic quality period piece - fun and flirty!

A great set for the modern man. PLEASE NOTE that the wallet is actually tinted a little brown rather than a complete shade or tinted color of black, which didn't bother me as much, but just be aware. Durable Mens Black Leather Wallet & Belt Gift Combo / 40" Black/Brown Reversible Dress Belt With Metal Buckle For Men / Bifold Wallets For Men Includes Ten Credit Card Slots Right out of the box in the un-boxing of the wallet and belt you're greeted with the odor of what resembles the smell similar to Mexican Leather. Now personally, I don't mind this smell, however, it's a little strong even for me . The belt and wallet were each enclosed in their own transparent bags/ sleeves, and well protected in the box. The Leather wallet feels very genuine, however, the material it's made out of (leather) doesn't feel nearly as strong/ stiff as most "genuine leather" wallets. It does have the advertised 10 card pockets, and sub-dividers in the inside main pocket (not mentioned in the description). The texture of the outer wallet is almost rash, yet soft. The inside is coated differently than the outside, comprising of a more weaker canvas brown material. The wallet is decent to have been as the tag states handcrafted, and while I personally have my own wallet preferences, it combines nicely with the texture of the belt. Speaking of, I like that the belt is reversible. Really saves you from going out to purchase another brown/ black belt. The texture of the belt itself is also a more coarser and stronger felt than the wallet. It feels like these were made out of the same leather, only more stronger. It doesn't have a slick and solid surface, it feels genuine and within a few uses, you're able to see "wrinkle" marks on it when used. The belt is a bit thinner than other belts, but still compliments nicely in the authentic look it has when worn with dress clothes. I am a size 34 waist and the belt fits me big, (it didn't have enough holes on it). So I punched some holes on it with no problem. Overall, a really nice and authentically looking set. The box and the ribbon on the top instantly makes this a perfect gift for a friend or loved one. If not, you can use it as storage or placement. Sample provided at a reduced or free price in exchange for an honest evaluation.
summary: Wallet tinted brown/dull green. Belt not "slick" textured a more "genuine leather feeling". Makes perfect gift, or for oneself.

reviewText:
This review is for the Durable Men's Black Leather Wallet & Belt Gift Combo / 40" Black / Brown Reversible Belt.

What a great set! It's packaged very nicely so it'd serve as a nice present. The belt has a strong leather smell (I like it, my husband found it a bit strong straight out of the box) and seems to be made well. The black side is a nice matte black, and the brown side is a nice medium brown - not too dark, and not too light. The reversible mechanism is easy to switch back and forth and it's impossible to know that it is a reversible belt. My husband loves these kinds of dual purpose things :).

I also like the wallet! It also appears to be made of a nice leather and has a good amount of pockets for all of my husband's cards.

I looked around for some time before purchasing this set and was not disappointed. My favorite part is really that it comes matching together and looks so presentable. I gave this to my husband as part of his birthday gift and it worked very well. I'm T hinking of doing the same for my father soon..

Please note that I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review but opinions are entirely my own. I hope this review is helpful to you. Happy shopping!

I purchased this black leather wallet and belt for my husband. He has gone thru so many belts in the last few years because they were poor quality material. Not only is this frustrating but very expensive. The holes either fray or the buckle breaks. This belt is 100% genuine leather and very well made. It feels both soft and very strong.
 It is also reversible which makes it an even better deal. He can wear this belt with his dress clothes and work clothes. The wallet matches the belt in quality. It is also 100% genuine leather. It is a bifold wallet with 10 credit card slots. It also has an extra key pocket for when he locks his keys in the car. :)
I depend greatly on reviews that are posted on Amazon. Even when I am left purchasing an item elsewhere, I read what the reviewers here have to say. I want to assist others by providing reviews that give detailed personal experience about the products that I buy on Amazon.
I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for my testing, inspecting and reviewing it. I received no compensation for my review and state my honest and unbiased opinion of the product. My words and the rating I provide are mine and are based on my own personal experience with this belt ans wallet set.
summary: Great quality leather belt and wallet.

reviewText:
This is a beautiful set!

The belt and wallet each look, smell, and feel of a fairly good quality leather.

The brown and black of the belt are beautiful.  Black is often pretty well done, but browns can be a bit too much on the orange or red side and this one is the perfect balance.  The wallet is more of a hybrid brown/black color.  I have included a photo of the belt sitting atop the wallet to give perspective to this particular color shade.

The stitching, on both the wallet and belt, appears to be quality work.  Additionally, the finish for both feels natural  not too stiff, not too rubbery.

The layout of the wallet is very nice, with a compartmentalized cash bill area.

The belt measurement was spot-on.

There are a few minor points that I would think the manufacturer could address easily:
- The mechanism to rotate the belt buckle is a little stiff.  I am not sure if this is something that will become more loose with use, or will wear with time.
- The wallets leather feels a little less luxurious than the belt.
- The gift box was coming apart in multiple corners, detracting from the look and feel of its contents.

I was given the opportunity to purchase this gift set at a discounted price, in exchange for my unbiased review.  I have provided honest information based on the product that was sent to me, and have included photos to help illustrate my points. Based on my experience I would recommend this product to family and friends.

With beautiful packaging, accurate description and pictures that don't do this product justice, I am very pleased with this purchase and it was a huge bonus that it came in earlier than expected!  Cannot wait to see my husbands face when he gets to open this gift!

The set includes a reversible black/brown belt and wallet. Both are beautifully crafted and would be the perfect accessory for any man. The belt measures at a size 40 and is reversible. The buckle is sturdy and is made of brushed steel. The belt can easily be reversed to either the black or brown side by simply twisting the buckle. The craftsmanship of the belt is amazing! I didn't see any loose threads or any imperfections. The wallet is a soft brown leather. It has 2 large bifold pockets for cash and/or anything else. It has 10 credit card slots for easy access to cards, ID, etc. The lining of the wallet is also of good quality. The wallet also has a very soft and genuine feel. You can actually smell the leather as you open the box. The set was packaged in a nice black and silver box. Both the wallet and the belt were packaged in plastic. I could smell the leather as soon as I opened the box. I would recommend this set as a gift to that special man in your life!

Nothing but good stuff to say about this belt and wallet! Took pics of the wallet fully loaded and it closes awesome, looks awesome, the belt fits hubby great just took a pic of it alone I'm sure you don't need to see it on his waist to know how that works. Best of all these smell amazing! My entire living room filled up with the awesome leather smell. REAL leather smell by the way, I'm sure a few of you know what I mean. The leather is soft and looks to be of a pretty high quality.

This set is great, it's a great gift for that special guy in your life! The belt itself is a dress belt not too thick so it'll fit through every belt loop I'm sure of it. I love how this looked just like it did in the photos on here, there's no special photography involved to make this look better for marketing purposes it is what it is and it's an awesome product! The belt is actually easily reversible.

These are made out of sheep leather in India which neither of us had had before, it's incredibly soft and I'm pretty happy with what they look like and think the price is decent!

**I received a discounted product for a review. My opinions are 100% honest and my own.**

I traveled around the world for the past 8 months and LOVED carrying this instead of a mini umbrella (every ounce counts for a minimalist light packer like myself).

PROS
- Incredibly lightweight
- Carrying pouch (sometimes I even used the poncho to sit on concrete steps that I thought might stain my clothes, and it was nice to throw this into the pouch instead of folding up those germs inside my purse and then easily being able to wash the whole thing)
- Roomy - I loved that I could put this on over my large purse or backpack and it would keep those things completely dry too, unlike those mini umbrellas
- Reversible

CONS
- They could surely find a way to make the "sleeves" and front a little longer so that more of you doesn't get wet
- One of the buttons broke off - they could've been sewed on a little more securely
summary: Great Minimalist Solution for Rain while Traveling

reviewText: I bought this to take on a trip to Disney...thought it would be a step up from  plastic ones they sell at the parks based on the reviews. Sadly, this could not have been further from the truth.  I wore it while the rest of the group I was with used the plastic ones.  I was completely soaked through- literally could wring water from my clothes. Everyone else was dry.  My purse, phone and everything else was ruined.  I might as well have been wearing no protection at all.  Ended up having to buy a towel and a t shirt because I was freezing and couldn't sit at the restaurant in the state I was in.  This purchase ended up costing me more than I bargained for.  Save your money and your belongings-use plastic!

I spent a long time online looking for the best rain solution for my upcoming trip to England and I'm so glad that I went with this Rainrap! It's light weight but not made of a cheap material. It's very good quality. It stores nicely in it's little bag so it's perfect to be tucked into a backpack, purse, glove box, etc.. ready to be whipped out and put stylishly into use when it starts raining. I LOVE it.

Excellent quality material. Easy to use and very aesthetically pleasing. People always compliment me and say that it's a nice belt. I would buy it again. It's also packaged very nicely.

Belt ratchet system is great. I love being able to size the belt according to your needs. Because of the ratchet system, it is easy on and off, but it also reduces continuous wear compared to a normal belt that you have to pull tight across the waist and buckled. Over time, this constant stretch will wear down a normal belt showing its age and leading to it falling apart faster (and sometimes when least expect it, leaving you without your favorite belt). This one looks great and the buckle will go with anything you feel like wearing.

reviewText:
I'm not a big fashion guy. I'm overweight, and I just want a belt to hold my pants up. Until now, I have bought traditional belts...you know, with the holes. And about every six months or so, the holes would start stretching out, the leather would start disintegrating, and it was back to the store for another belt.

I love this belt! The leather feels strong, the buckle is solid, and best of all, the ratchet system means no more stretching and pulling the leather out of shape. I also love that I don't have to search through hundreds of belts to find my size, because this belt comes ready to cut to your perfect size.

My husband liked this belt so well, he ordered another one. From another company, the belt said it would fit over a 44" waist, which it did not. This one was very long and easily adjustable. My husband wanted the belt so that he can adjust easily while losing weight.
summary: My husband liked this belt so well

I've used key wallets like this to manage easy access to keys, ID, credit cards and money for a long time. This version has a feature that I've never had before: the window pocket to hold your ID is INSIDE the zippered pouch. That means that my ID and whatever else I tuck in that pocket will not fall out, ever. It's odd using a cloth product instead of leather or pleather--it's not as stiff--but with ID in the pocket, it has enough structure to stick in my back pocket as needed for pumping gas or whatever.

This jacket is made of very cheap material. Really I would say this jacket is costume quality. The material just feels very rough. Along with the cheap material, the top button on my blazer was sewn on upside down. Now you are probably wondering why I gave the jacket three stars even though the material is poor and buttons were sewn on upside down. Well I will say that the jacket's design is one of a kind, and even though the material may be cheap the overall jacket was stitched well and unlike other Asian blazers I have purchased, it did not have any loose strings or material hanging anywhere. I have received blazers from other sellers that have been far worse than this one. I originally needed the blazer for a role in a short film. Once again I will say that I like the look of the jacket just not the material it is made of.  Overall all I'm neither happy nor sad about the purchase just indifferent. The jacket did fit me perfectly. If you are considering purchasing this blazer make sure you order two sizes up. reviewText:
This is a review for the black dress. I am 5ft-nothing. I hate wearing tight clothes so I usually go with a junior medium and then wash them in hot to make them shrink. I didn't know if this dress was going to be a junior size or not, but I read other reviews that said it ran large, so I went with small, and I'm really glad I did! The dress runs big. It runs like a size small in Apt. 9, Max Studio, White House Black Market brands (aka it's big!). It is NOT Wet Seal or Hollister small. In those brands, it would be a large or x-large. I washed it in hot water and each time it shrinks a little. Because of the material (knit, soft, stretchy), I think it'll continue to shrink a little every time I put it in the wash on hot (which I'm hoping it will). It's still not tight around the stomach or waist, though. I like the length, it's very classy because it hits right below the knees for me. I wear it with the sleeves pushed up because it looks much better overall as a 3/4 sleeve than a long sleeve because of the odd, kind of boxy shape(non-shape) of this dress.
The material is on the thinner side, but I like it! I wore it to work and the friction/swinging of my badge on the dress caused that one particular part on the dress to get that fuzzy, pilled look. But I have a fabric lint/pile remover so I just went over it with that once I got home and it came out like new. The v-neck is not a deep as shown and can be worn at work without all that cleavage. Product provided at a discounted price for my honest, unbiased opinion and review.
summary: I hate wearing tight clothes so I usually go with a ...

reviewText: I included 5 photos with my review. This dress would have gotten 5 stars had it been sewn with better fabric that wasn't so see through. In the day time I suggest wearing a slip underneath, the evening to night time wear is ok since it is dark outside. In my pictures the close out of the dress shows the see through-ness with my legs apart to show you the clarity of the fabric. The dress fits as expected, with a waist trimmer and proper no show panties I think this dress would look classy and it can be dressed up or down. All the stitching is straight and no loose threads hanging on the dress. It did take about 2 and a half weeks to arrive, wish it could of gotten here faster to the US. I received this item at a discounted amount and I would like to leave my honest unbiased opinion.
summary: Fits as expected, a little see through
